metadata.title: CVE-2020-10749 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in all versions of containernetworking/pluginsbefore version 0.8.6, that allows malicious containers in Kubernetesclusters to perform man-in-the-middle (MitM) attacks. A malicious containercan exploit this flaw by sending rogue IPv6 router advertisements to thehost or other containers, to redirect traffic to the malicious container.

criterions.comment: golang-github-containernetworking-plugins package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
